questions.question: A shopkeeper sells an item at a loss of 10%. If the cost price is ₹500, what is the selling price?
If CAT = 3120 and DOG = 4157, what is PIG?
questions.solution: Letter positions: P(16) I(9) G(7) → 16 9 7 → pattern based encoding

questions.question: Choose the antonym of ‘Transparent’.
questions.solution: Opaque is the opposite of transparent.
